name: P.E.T Defense
description:
This Game was made in 4 Hours for a Challenge with the theme of Giant Pet

Use your Giant P.E.T Plane to Defend your Army of  Military Rovers!

Use Buttons 1-4 to Build Structures and WASD or Arrow Keys to Move

Use your Mouse to move your P.E.T, It will Shoot Automatically when Facing a Enemy

Move over Trees to Collect Wood

Don't let your Main Rover or P.E.T Die!
